resources.string: Do you want to remove this contact from the authorized users list?
Successfully added a contact to the allowed list from the contact database.
Failed to insert record into allowed list from contact database.
This contact was already on the allowed list.
Textecutor needs you to enable Do Not Disturb access so that it can turn your volume up and disable Do Not Disturb mode. Do you want to proceed?
Give Textecutor Do Not Disturb access?
Textecutor needs access to read SMS so that it can watch for incoming commands. Without this permission, Textecutor cannot function.
Allow people to remotely turn your volume all the way up.
